00059 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 |   PLT_CtrlPointListener class
00061 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 class PLT_CtrlPointListener
00068 {
00069 public:
00070     virtual ~PLT_CtrlPointListener() {}
00071 
00072     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceAdded(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device) = 0;
00073     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device) = 0;
00074     virtual NPT_Result OnActionResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata) = 0;
00075     virtual NPT_Result OnEventNotify(PLT_Service* service, NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>* vars) = 0;
00076 };
00077 
00078 typedef NPT_List<PLT_CtrlPointListener*> PLT_CtrlPointListenerList;

00080 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 |   PLT_CtrlPoint class
00082 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 class PLT_CtrlPoint : public PLT_SsdpPacketListener,
00089                       public PLT_SsdpSearchResponseListener,
00090                       public NPT_HttpRequestHandler
00091 {
00092 public:
00093     PLT_CtrlPoint(const char* search_criteria = "upnp:rootdevice"); // pass NULL to prevent repeated automatic search
00094     virtual ~PLT_CtrlPoint();
00095 
00096     // delegation
00097     NPT_Result AddListener(PLT_CtrlPointListener* listener);
00098     NPT_Result RemoveListener(PLT_CtrlPointListener* listener);
00099 
00100     // discovery
00101     void       IgnoreUUID(const char* uuid);
00102     NPT_Result Search(const NPT_HttpUrl& url = NPT_HttpUrl("239.255.255.250", 1900, "*"), 
00103                       const char*        target = "upnp:rootdevice", 
00104                       NPT_Cardinal       mx = 5,
00105                       NPT_TimeInterval   frequency = NPT_TimeInterval(50.), // pass NPT_TimeInterval(0.) for one time only
00106                       NPT_TimeInterval   initial_delay = NPT_TimeInterval(0.));
00107     NPT_Result Discover(const NPT_HttpUrl& url = NPT_HttpUrl("239.255.255.250", 1900, "*"), 
00108                         const char*        target = "ssdp:all", 
00109                         NPT_Cardinal       mx = 5,
00110                         NPT_TimeInterval   frequency = NPT_TimeInterval(50.)); // pass NPT_TimeInterval(0.) for one time only
00111 
00112     // actions
00113     NPT_Result FindActionDesc(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00114                               const char*              service_type,
00115                               const char*              action_name,
00116                               PLT_ActionDesc*&         action_desc);
00117     NPT_Result CreateAction(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00118                             const char*              service_type,
00119                             const char*              action_name,
00120                             PLT_ActionReference&     action);
00121     NPT_Result InvokeAction(PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata = NULL);
00122 
00123     // events
00124     NPT_Result Subscribe(PLT_Service* service, 
00125                          bool         cancel = false, 
00126                          void*        userdata = NULL);
00127 
00128     // NPT_HttpRequestHandler methods
00129     virtual NPT_Result SetupResponse(NPT_HttpRequest&              request,
00130                                      const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00131                                      NPT_HttpResponse&             response);
00132 
00133     // PLT_SsdpSearchResponseListener methods
00134     virtual NPT_Result ProcessSsdpSearchResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00135                                                  const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00136                                                  NPT_HttpResponse*             response);
00137     // PLT_SsdpPacketListener method
00138     virtual NPT_Result OnSsdpPacket(const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00139                                     const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00140 
00141 protected:
00142 
00143     NPT_Result   Start(PLT_SsdpListenTask* task);
00144     NPT_Result   Stop(PLT_SsdpListenTask* task);
00145 
00146     NPT_Result   ProcessSsdpNotify(const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00147                                    const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00148     NPT_Result   ProcessSsdpMessage(const NPT_HttpMessage&        message, 
00149                                     const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,  
00150                                     NPT_String&                   uuid);
00151     NPT_Result   ProcessGetDescriptionResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00152                                                const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00153                                                const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00154                                                NPT_HttpResponse*             response,
00155                                                PLT_DeviceDataReference&      root_device);
00156     NPT_Result   ProcessGetSCPDResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00157                                         const NPT_HttpRequest&        request,
00158                                         const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00159                                         NPT_HttpResponse*             response,
00160                                         PLT_DeviceDataReference&      device);
00161     NPT_Result   ProcessActionResponse(NPT_Result               res, 
00162                                        NPT_HttpResponse*        response,
00163                                        PLT_ActionReference&     action,
00164                                        void*                    userdata);
00165     NPT_Result   ProcessSubscribeResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00166                                           const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00167                                           const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context, 
00168                                           NPT_HttpResponse*             response,
00169                                           PLT_Service*                  service,
00170                                           void*                         userdata);
00171     NPT_Result   ProcessHttpNotify(const NPT_HttpRequest&        request,
00172                                    const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00173                                    NPT_HttpResponse&             response);
00174 private:
00175     // methods
00176     NPT_Result RenewSubscribers();
00177     NPT_Result RenewSubscriber(PLT_EventSubscriber& subscriber);
00178     NPT_Result DoHouseKeeping();
00179     NPT_Result FetchDeviceSCPDs(PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask* task,
00180                                 PLT_DeviceDataReference&  device, 
00181                                 NPT_Cardinal              level);
00182     NPT_Result InspectDevice(const NPT_HttpUrl& location, 
00183                              const char*        uuid, 
00184                              NPT_TimeInterval   leasetime = PLT_Constants::GetInstance().m_DefaultDeviceLease);
00185     NPT_Result FindDevice(const char* uuid, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, bool return_root = false);
00186     NPT_Result AddDevice(PLT_DeviceDataReference& data);
00187     NPT_Result NotifyDeviceReady(PLT_DeviceDataReference& data);
00188     NPT_Result RemoveDevice(PLT_DeviceDataReference& data);
00189     NPT_Result NotifyDeviceRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& data);
00190     NPT_Result CleanupDevice(PLT_DeviceDataReference& data);
00191     
00192     NPT_Result ParseFault(PLT_ActionReference& action, NPT_XmlElementNode* fault);
00193     PLT_SsdpSearchTask* CreateSearchTask(const NPT_HttpUrl&   url, 
00194                                          const char*          target, 
00195                                          NPT_Cardinal         mx, 
00196                                          NPT_TimeInterval     frequency,
00197                                          const NPT_IpAddress& address);
00198     
00199 private:
00200     friend class NPT_Reference<PLT_CtrlPoint>;
00201     friend class PLT_UPnP;
00202     friend class PLT_UPnP_CtrlPointStartIterator;
00203     friend class PLT_UPnP_CtrlPointStopIterator;
00204     friend class PLT_EventSubscriberRemoverIterator;
00205     friend class PLT_CtrlPointGetDescriptionTask;
00206     friend class PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask;
00207     friend class PLT_CtrlPointInvokeActionTask;
00208     friend class PLT_CtrlPointHouseKeepingTask;
00209     friend class PLT_CtrlPointSubscribeEventTask;
00210 
00211     NPT_List<NPT_String>                         m_UUIDsToIgnore;
00212     NPT_Lock<PLT_CtrlPointListenerList>          m_ListenerList;
00213     PLT_HttpServer*                              m_EventHttpServer;
00214     PLT_TaskManager                              m_TaskManager;
00215     NPT_Lock<NPT_List<PLT_DeviceDataReference> > m_Devices;
00216     NPT_Lock<NPT_List<PLT_EventSubscriber*> >    m_Subscribers;
00217     NPT_String                                   m_SearchCriteria;
00218 };
